text_block_list.text:
Class was over for the day. I came to the office to pass the time 
before the start of evening training, when…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer-san. Don't mind me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But of course! Model student, that's me! Nah, I'm 
kidding. I just borrowed this manga from my friend 
and I wanted somewhere quiet to read it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"To The Ends Of The Turf", it's called. You heard of it? All the 
kids are reading it, you know.

I picked it up off the table and looked at the cover. It looked 
like a story about Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That'll be a "no", then?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Really now, Trainer-san! It won't do to be out of 
touch with the youth when it comes to these things… 
Well, I'd never heard of it either, but…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, my friend insisted I read it. And you know what, I can 
see why it's so popular. I'm telling you, I can't put it down!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well it's about this Uma Musume, right? And she wants 
to be a big star, so she's got to go up against her 
friends, her rivals, that sort of thing…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And right now she's just missed out on her dream of 
winning the Triple Crown…! It's brutal!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And she's like "As long as I can run one more step… 
my dream of being a star Uma Musume will never die…!!!" 
Ahh, I'm getting choked up again just thinking about it…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh. Spoken like a real star. Girls like that just have 
something different than the rest of us…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Strength, hard work, self-belief… she's got it all! A perfect, 
shining beacon of Uma Musume-ness!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well I mean, uh, she is just a manga character, but…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But you know what I mean, right? We've even got 
a couple of girls like that at the academy. The 
real celebs. You know who I'm talking about.
choice_data_list:
But you're not going to let them get 
the better of you, am I right?

But you're not going to let them get 
the better of you, am I right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey, knock it off, I see what you're trying to do.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, you see, me? I'm like this main character's friend, the 
shoulder she cries on when it all goes wrong…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: She even sounds like me. Here listen to this…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"Don't beat yourself up. Hard work can only get you so far…" 
Doesn't that sound like the sort of thing I'd say?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I kind of want to tell her to get a grip, you know!? 
But then I'm like, "hey, look who's talking"…

text_block_list.name: Nature's friend
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me? Is Nature here…? Ah, there you are! 
I just finished the new "Turf". Here!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, thanks!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I was just telling trainer-san about it, actually. 
About that one background character who…

text_block_list.name: Nature's friend
text_block_list.text:
Oh, her? She finally gets her big 
moment in this one! It's so good!

text_block_list.name: Nature's friend
text_block_list.text:
She's all like… "I know I'm not the strongest, I know I'm not the 
fastest… but I'll give it my best… so I can stand on the top step 
of the podium… and smile!" You've got to read it!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaa hey! Whoa! Spoiler alert! Ahaha… wait, what? 
SHE said that? But she's just a background character, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? No, no, no, no. C'mon, can you imagine 
me saying something like that?

text_block_list.name: Nature's friend
text_block_list.text:
I don't know, now that you mention it, recently you DO seem a 
little more… serious? Like you're putting your heart and soul 
into your training and everything…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Not you too! No, no, no, no, no, don't be ridiculous, 
you'd never catch me carrying on like that. C'mon, cut it out!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uhhh anyway! Isn't it time for training? I'm going to the track.
choice_data_list: That's it! Reach for that top step!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahh!! Quit it! I don't sound like that!!
And so began another day of training with Nice Nature.
